TopicTitle: Finally Docked and in Minmus orbit no less!

Articles.Content: After about an hour of silent cursing and orbit changing I finally did it. I docked two things in space in career mode orbiting minmus. Now I have to bring more people to operate the new module.

Yeah big congrats, milestone reached.

You even docked off-axis which is just a tiny bit trickier again.

Now, if i remember my own progress correctly, you face the awesome joy of designing apollo-style CM-Lander missions. Was a great few days in the VAB for me.

edit: though by your sig maybe you wanna iron out your landing/takeoff woes first XD
This took me ages, only just managed to pull it off last week. Well done!

congrats, not a small feat, one of the most satisfying things to do, now you can have fun with appollo style lander missions and build a big space station that'll lag your game and all that good stuff!
